CODING: 0 MEANS THAT THE PATIENT HAS REACHED MENOPAUSE WHILE 1 MEANS THAT THE PATIENT HAS NOT REACHED MENOPAUSE YET.

Column Description: The size in centimeter of the excised tumor
The number of axillary lymph nodes that contain metastatic

Column Description: If it occurs on the left or right side
CODING: CODED AS A BINARY DISTRIBUTION 1 MEANS THE CANCER HAS SPREAD, 0 MEANS IT HASN'T SPREAD YET.

Column Description: If the cancer has spread to other part of the body or organ
